nobulk.name: No Dropped Bulk
nobulk.hint: (Requires Reload) Dropped equipment in an actor's inventory won't be accounted for bulk value calculation

arp.name: Automatic Rune Progression
arp.hint: (Requires Reload) Meant to be used in stead of the ABP variant rule to automatically give potency/striking/resilient runes to equipment

unided.name: Set Un-Identified Image
unided.hint: Automatically set the un-identifed image of items to be the same as the regular image

knowledges.name: Npc Lore Knowledges
knowledges.hint: Adds the option to set custom lores for NPCs

effect-remove.name: Remove Effect Shortcut
effect-remove.hint: Using [Shift + Right Click] on effect icons in the effects panel will instantly remove all its charges/counters/badges

condition-sheet.name: Condition Sheet Icon
condition-sheet.hint: Adds a new icon to condition in the effects panel to open their sheet just like you would with non-condition effects

pf2e-toolbelt.module-conflict: The module {name} is not needed while using PF2e ToolBelt, you can disable it safely

arp.forceVariant: The module PF2e ToolBelt disabled the pf2e system variant ABP rule to work properly

editLore.hint: Enter comma separated lores which will replace the generic ones in the sheet
